title: Andreas Gammelgaard Damsbo
text:
Hi! I am a medical doctor and PhD-student at the Aarhus University Hospital and at [Aarhus University](https://pure.au.dk/portal/da/persons/andreas-gammelgaard-damsbo(e3c4afce-3eba-4456-8b8b-2fd90775c87a).html).
This page is my professional website, where I will try to write about the research and other projects I am engaged with through my work. Don’t hesitate to contact me if you want to collaborate or want to share your thoughts on some of my work.
I also do other things than work, which I might link to. Take care!

title: Project: Foot database
text:
This project is the most comprehensive data base migration yet.
The client’s wish, was for an old Microsoft Access data base to be migrated to REDCap, for continous use and data collection.

title: Project: Foot database
text:

title: Project: Foot database
text:
Database
Here are a few characteristics:

Around 3000 entries
5 collection instruments, 4 of them were to be used as repeatable instruments.
80 variables

title: Project: Foot database
text:
Coding
I have collected my scripts in a repository, which will be made public when I have finished the work.

title: Research results

title: ESOC 2023: Predicting physical activity level after stroke
text: I am presenting a poster at European Stroke Organisation Conference 2023 on predicting changes in physical activity after stroke.

title: ESOC 2023: Predicting physical activity level after stroke
text: I am presenting a poster at European Stroke Organisation Conference 2023 on predicting changes in physical activity after stroke.

title: ESOC 2023: Predicting physical activity level after stroke
text:
Background
We have been interested in trying to predict patients at incresed risk of physical activity decline after stroke.

title: Health Data projects
text:
During my work in clinical research I have aquired a special set of skills in working with data collection, data bases and data analysis. I am very much interested in sharing these skils and knowledge.
I am primarily working with R and REDCap. I have published one R package to CRAN and am actively maintaining two other packages on GitHub (on is on its way to CRAN). I am also working on a handbook for clinical researchers on working with R and REDCap.
I have work as a data science consultant on a few projects. Here I will also share a few of them as a portfolio. Please don't hesitate to 
contact me if you need help on a project.
